name: ReassureMe
0:
”Alexa, reassure me.”
”Alexa, reassure Sarah with reassure me.”
”Alexa, ask reassure me to reassure Sarah.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reassure me
des: Tell Alexa to "reassure me" and she will offer words of reassurance.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
